fields.name: Wonka Triple Caramel Drizzle Bar
fields.description: Who cares about finding a golden ticket when you’ve got such chocolate-y perfection staring you in the face? This enticing combination of rich fudge encased within sinfully decadent milk chocolate is so good, you’d still be pleased as punch if each of these candy bar wrappers contained a parking ticket (and, even better, they don’t. ). The natural ingredients give these bars a truly amazing taste that you will run all the way home for.

fields.name: Wonka Chilly Chocolate Creme Bar
fields.description: Who cares about finding a golden ticket when you’ve got such spicy chocolate-y perfection staring you in the face? This enticing combination of chilli encased within sinfully creamy milk chocolate is so good, you’d still be pleased as punch if each of these candy bar wrappers contained a parking ticket (and, even better, they don’t. ). The natural ingredients give these bars a truly amazing taste that you will run all the way home for.

fields.name: Wonka Whipple-Scrumptious Fudgemallow Delight Bar
fields.description: Who cares about finding a golden ticket when you’ve got such spicy chocolate-y perfection staring you in the face? This enticing combination of chilli encased within sinfully creamy milk chocolate is so good, you’d still be pleased as punch if each of these candy bar wrappers contained a parking ticket (and, even better, they don’t. ). 'Wonka's Whipple-Scrumptious Fudgemallow Delight!'" cried Grandpa George. 'It's the best of them all! You'll just love it!'" - From Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

fields.name: Wonka Nutty Crunch Surprise Bar
fields.description: Who cares about finding a golden ticket when you’ve got such nutty chocolate-y perfection staring you in the face? This enticing combination of nutty tasting mousse filling and biscuit pieces encased within sinfully creamy milk chocolate is so good, you’d still be pleased as punch if each of these candy bar wrappers contained a parking ticket (and, even better, they don’t. ).

fields.name: Wonka Original Chocolate Bar
fields.description: Who cares about finding a golden ticket when you’ve got such chocolate-y perfection staring you in the face? This enticing bar of sinfully creamy milk chocolate is so good, you’d still be pleased as punch if each of these candy bar wrappers contained a parking ticket (and, even better, they don’t. ).

fields.name: Wonka Strawberry and Snow Candy Cane
fields.description: The perfect Christmas treat. This joyful combination of vanilla ice cream and fresh strawberry will leave even those on the naughty list feeling nice. Made in collaboration with St Nicholas’s workshop.

fields.name: Wonka Rainbow Swirl Lollipop
fields.description: All the joy of a rainbow captured in a sweet rock candy swirl. This happy treat will leave even the most dour jumping for joy. Makes for a perfect surprise and when in need can double as a shiv with a hard tap.

fields.name: Wonka Rainbow Unicorn Lollipop
fields.description: All the joy of a rainbow captured in a sweet rock candy unicorn horn. This happy treat contains all the joy of riding a unicorn across a blue sky. Makes for a delicious snack for children and the perfect toy for daring adults.

fields.name: Wonka Tropical and Raspberry Nerds
fields.description: Tiny, tangy, crunchy candy you can eat in your own way. Tropical punch candy is on one side of the box and Raspberry on the other side. Try both flavors alone or together.

fields.name: Wonka Grape and Strawberry Nerds
fields.description: Tiny, tangy, crunchy candy you can eat in your own way. Strawberry candy is on one side of the box and Grape on the other side. Try both flavors alone or together.

fields.name: Wonka Rainbow Nerds
fields.description: Tiny, tangy, crunchy candy you can eat in your own way. A variety of mixed flavors. Try flavors alone or together.

fields.name: Wonka Nerds Bumpy Jelly Beans
fields.description: Chewilicious jelly beans covered with a bumpalicious Nerds shell. Use this unique treat to decorate your candy bowl or fill Easter eggs.

fields.name: Wonka 100 Flavor Jelly Beans
fields.description: Chewilicious jelly beans that come in over 100 flavors. Use this unique treat to wow your friends and keep life interesting!

fields.name: Wonka Oompas
fields.description: You'll dance like a jolly Oompa Loompa in baggy pants when you taste these fruity candy sensations! Oompas candy tastes like Skittles and features a mix of six fruity flavors: Green Apple, Cherry, Lemon, Orange, Grape, and Strawberry.

fields.name: Wonka Laffy Taffy
fields.description: A delicious long lasting taffy that will leave you with the best kind of lockjaw! Best part is our laffy taffy doesn't cause cavities and it comes in 3 great flavors (Strawberry, Sour Apple and Banana).

fields.name: Wonka Gummy Worms
fields.description: Chewy gummy worms that come in a variety of flavors. Each worm is half sweet and half sour, good luck figuring out which is which! No worms were harmed in the making of this candy.

fields.name: Wonka Gummy Bears
fields.description: Chewy gummy bears that come in a variety of flavors. Each bear has been specially formulated to carry 10 times its weight in flavor! We cannot guarantee that no bears were harmed in the making of this candy.

fields.name: Wonka Three Course Gum
fields.description: A piece of candy that will change the world. A single strip of Wonka’s three course gum provides a fully nutritious three course meal, starter, main and dessert, in a single serving! Each strip contains various starters, mains and desserts and is subject to a random assortment.

fields.name: Wonka Everlasting Gobstopper
fields.description: A magical gobstopper that will last forever. Patented Wonka technology has allowed us to create a piece of candy that renews itself, never becoming less flavorful or potent over time!

fields.name: Wonka Fizzy Lifting Drinks
fields.description: A liquid candy that will leave you feeling weightless! Packaged in glass bottles, each fizzy lifting drink will release you from the shackles of gravity for 1 hour. 4 Flavors available (Cherry, Blueberry, Lemon and Apple )

fields.name: Wonka Fire Candy
fields.description: Wonka fire candy takes spicy to a whole new level. Our science oompas have created a candy that will allow you to safely taste the sun with zero pain without having to leaving the planet!

fields.name: Wonka Glowing Lollipop
fields.description: This magical candy will light up your world and save your electric bill. Created using special extracts from photon-flowers grown in our oompa greenhouses.

fields.name: Wonka Lickable Wallpaper
fields.description: Imagine having walls that like your favorite fruits! Well now you can with Wonka Lickable Wallpaper! This unique oompa creation is self-cleaning, aromatic and delicious!

fields.name: Wonka Marshmallow Pillow
fields.description: Ever found yourself laying in bed unable to sleep, hungry with a pillow you just can't position right? Well now you never need to experience that again! Our patented Marshmallow pillow is the comfort snack you’ve always dreamed about!

fields.name: Wonka Loser Mug
fields.description: The best mug to drink hot chocolate! For a extra yummy experience, dissolve a few blocks of our Wonka Original Chocolate Bar in a milk of your choice and stir using our Wonka Strawberry and Snow Candy Cane!

fields.name: Wonka Brown Shirt
fields.description: The perfect shirt to wear if you win the golden ticket raffle!

fields.name: Wonka Purple Hoodie
fields.description: The perfect hoodie to wear over your Wonka Shirt to keep warm whilst sipping hot chocolate out of a Wonka Mug!

fields.name: Wonka Bracelet
fields.description: A stylish wearable reminder to all around you that you can be bribed with Wonka Candy! Goes perfectly with our Wonk Shirt.

fields.name: Wonka Keychain
fields.description: Attach to keys in case you ever lose it! Perfect way to demonstrate your allegiance to the Wonka brand!

fields.name: Wonka Tote Bag
fields.description: A must have to store your Wonka Candy and Merchandise!
